Intention.name: sealAndSortPackets
Intention.Documentation: The primary goal/intention is to seal and sort the packets as per the business rule.

Intention.name: highHRUtilization
Intention.Documentation: Employees must be used optimally across the company structure without any idle time.

Intention.name: highThroughput
Intention.Documentation: Throughput time must be increased to remain competitive in the market.
